item.title: OverTheWire - Bandit
item.description: Computer security is something I have always been interested in, but I have never really invested much time into it. So after some poking around online, OverTheWire came up in my searches as a good capture the flag style site to learn and practice some security concepts. The Bandit CTF is the easiest option, so I started there. Each of the 33 levels covered a different topic: level 0 covered basic ssh access.
